jobsJson.descriptionPlain: You will build data driven solutions to improve our partners’ lives including hundreds of thousands of merchants and millions of customers, by building data driven product features, data analytics tools, data pipelines and large scale data infrastructure. You and your team will work to improve especially Gojek entertainment products which are GoPlay, GoStudio, GoTix, GoLive, and LOKET.
jobsJson.description: You will build data driven solutions to improve our partners’ lives including hundreds of thousands of merchants and millions of customers, by building data driven product features, data analytics tools, data pipelines and large scale data infrastructure. You and your team will work to improve especially Gojek entertainment products which are GoPlay, GoStudio, GoTix, GoLive, and LOKET.
jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
jobsJson.additional:

lists.content:
• Maintain and generate data tool by gathering requirements and manage expectations from Entertainment stakeholders to assess reporting tool that’s needed to generate business insights. Also craft and maintain data tool based on business users’ needs and suggest improvements or new tool to gather awareness or steps we can do 
  • Derive analysis and insight by understanding how the business works to drive more acquisition and use-cases of Entertainment product. Along with conduct analysis on how user behavior might impact their use-cases and improvement to overall business
  • Conduct experiment and A/B testing to connect with key stakeholders and understand how to derive more product use-cases using experiment and seek for new ways on how to convert more gojek user to be able to use Entertainment product

• 2+ year experience as analyst or similar industry with exposure on running experiment or A/B testing
  • High SQL Proficiency is a must with experience in Python/R or Tableau and knowledge about Shell ScriptingExperience working/projects with transactional data
  • Data driven, detail oriented, curious and able to learn independentlyWilling to work in teams and collaborate with stakeholders
  • Experience in coaching team members on conducting experiments with background in mathematics, statistics, information systems, or other tech/science major
